synopsis.text: Rias Gremory, a stunning and high-ranking devil, resurrects Issei Hyoudou, an ordinary lecherous high school student, as her servant after he is brutally murdered by a fallen angel disguised as his date. Issei, who dreams of having his own harem, finds himself in a world of angels and devils as a member of the Occult Research Club at his school. Despite being the weakest devil, he possesses a powerful Sacred Gear that makes him a target for fallen angels. As he navigates this dangerous new world, Issei must train and fight to survive while keeping his new life a secret from his friends and family. With each new adventure, he encounters a wealth of development opportunities and hilarious, risqu√© moments with his beautiful new companions. Will Issei finally get the harem he's always wanted, or will the battle between angels and devils prove to be too much for him to handle?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
